sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { registerForm:FormGroup =new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl( "Ahmed", [ Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(15), Validators.minLength(3) ]), email:new FormControl(null, [ Validators.required, Validators.email ] ), password:new FormControl(null, [ Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^[A-Z][a-z0-9]{3,8}$/) ] ), rePassword:new FormControl(null, [ Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^[A-Z][a-z0-9]{3,8}$/) ] ), phone:new FormControl( null, [ Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^01[0125][0-9]{8}$/) ] ), }) register(x:FormGroup){ console.log(x); } }

Register Now :

requird
